name: ABC Games For Kids
description: ABC Games for Kids is a collection of developmental puzzle games for children! Journey through 7 different locations:  - Dino Land - Pirate Island - Royal Castle - Fun Farm - Future Town - Auto Land - Underwater World  Each location is packed with over 7 different developmental games, including puzzles, matching shapes, sizes and colors, all kinds of coloring activities, and more!  ABC Games for Kids is the perfect helper for mom and dad. Help your child grow and learn all kinds of usefull skills every day!  Were always available to talk and cant wait to hear your feedback!  ======================== COMPANY COMMUNITY:  ======================== Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AzurGamesOfficial Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/azur_games YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/AzurInteractiveGames
